statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_coverage
SELECT satellite_id, coverage_area FROM satellite_communication_coverage
SELECT coverage_area, signal_strength FROM satellite_communication_coverage
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_coverage WHERE satellite_id = 1
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_coverage WHERE signal_strength > 0.8
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_coverage WHERE signal_strength > 0.5 ORDER BY satellite_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT satellite_id, coverage_area FROM satellite_communication_coverage WHERE signal_strength < 0.8
SELECT coverage_area, signal_strength FROM satellite_communication_coverage WHERE satellite_id = 1
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_coverage WHERE signal_strength BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY signal_strength
SELECT satellite_id, coverage_area, signal_strength FROM satellite_communication_coverage
SELECT * FROM satellite_coverage_areas;
SELECT area_name, coverage_range FROM satellite_coverage_areas WHERE coverage_range > 100;
SELECT id, satellite_id, signal_strength FROM signal_strength ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_coverage_areas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT area_name AS area, coverage_range AS range FROM satellite_coverage_areas;
SELECT * FROM satellite_coverage_areas WHERE coverage_range > 50 ORDER BY area_name DESC
SELECT id, area_name FROM satellite_coverage_areas WHERE coverage_range BETWEEN 30 AND 70 LIMIT 5
SELECT area_name, coverage_range FROM satellite_coverage_areas WHERE id = 3
SELECT id, SUM(signal_strength) AS total_strength FROM signal_strength GROUP BY id HAVING total_strength > 100
SELECT s.area_name AS satellite_area, ss.signal_strength FROM satellite_coverage_areas s JOIN signal_strength ss ON s.id = ss.satellite_id
SELECT * FROM coverage_areas;
SELECT satellite_id, coverage_area FROM coverage_areas WHERE signal_strength > 50;
SELECT satellite_id, coverage_area, signal_strength FROM coverage_areas ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellite_details WHERE manufacturer = 'SpaceX';
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, signal_strength FROM signal_strength_history WHERE satellite_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM coverage_areas WHERE signal_strength > 50 ORDER BY coverage_area ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT satellite_id, MAX(signal_strength) FROM coverage_areas GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING MAX(signal_strength) > 70;
SELECT satellite_name, manufacturer FROM satellite_details WHERE launch_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY manufacturer, satellite_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT coverage_area, signal_strength, timestamp FROM coverage_areas JOIN signal_strength_history ON coverage_areas.satellite_id = signal_strength_history.satellite_id WHERE signal_strength > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT coverage_area, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM coverage_areas GROUP BY coverage_area HAVING total_count > 2 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteCoverageArea;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellite ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT coverage_area_name, signal_strength FROM SatelliteCoverageArea WHERE signal_strength > 0.5;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE coverage_area_id = 3;
SELECT signal_id, signal_time FROM CommunicationSignal ORDER BY signal_time ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellite;
SELECT coverage_area_name, signal_strength FROM SatelliteCoverageArea ORDER BY coverage_area_id DESC;
SELECT signal_id, satellite_id, signal_time FROM CommunicationSignal WHERE signal_strength > 0.5;
SELECT coverage_area_id, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;

SELECT s.satellite_name, sa.coverage_area_name, c.signal_strength FROM Satellite s JOIN SatelliteCoverageArea sa ON s.satellite_id = sa.satellite_id JOIN CommunicationSignal c ON sa.satellite_id = c.satellite_id;
SELECT * FROM AreaCoverage;
SELECT satellite_id, signal_strength FROM SignalStrength;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM SatellitePosition;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, operator, launch_date FROM SatelliteDetails;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, communication_type FROM CommunicationLogs;
SELECT satellite_name, operator, launch_date FROM SatelliteDetails;
SELECT * FROM AreaCoverage WHERE signal_strength > 0.5;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, communication_type FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE signal_strength < 0.3;
SELECT satellite_id, longitude, latitude FROM SatellitePosition ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, azimuth_angle, elevation_angle FROM SignalStrength WHERE azimuth_angle BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
